participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, loves to engage with friends and share her love for music.
participant_1.background: i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i play with my friends on the playground. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to go to disney world every year. i am in the third grade.

participant_2.name: John
participant_2.personality: Warm-hearted and wise, enjoys sharing stories from his life and values family.
participant_2.background: i have amazing children and grandchildren. i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes. i am retired and living the great life.

content.text: i like to sing , and i also like to sing , and you ?
i am retired and living the great life. how old are you?
that's cool , i am in the 3rd grade , i am a teacher , and you ?
I'm and old man and i have amazing children and grandchildren. what is your favorite color?
i like to sing , and i also like to sing , and you ?
i can sew my own clothes so i never get bored. have you ever seen the rain?
i like to sing , and i also like to sing , and you ?
i had cancer but its gone now. have you seen it?
that's cool , i am in the 3rd grade , i am a teacher , and you ?
